book.title: The Girl Scouts of the Round Table
book.description: 简介： THE snow had fallen several days before. This afternoon the ground was hard and white, with a thin crust of ice.Spinning in the air were small silver crystals that danced in the winter wind as if with no thought of ever settling down upon the earth....
